org.nd4j.parameterserver.distributed.v2.transport.impl

Class AeronUdpTransport

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.nd4j.parameterserver.distributed.v2.transport.impl.BaseTransport
      • org.nd4j.parameterserver.distributed.v2.transport.impl.AeronUdpTransport
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AutoCloseable, Transport

    public class AeronUdpTransport
extends BaseTransport
implements AutoCloseable
    This class is a UDP implementation of Transport interface, based on Aeron
    Author:
    raver119@gmail.com

        public <T extends VoidMessage> void addInterceptor(@NonNull
                                                   @NonNull Class<T> cls,
                                                   @NonNull
                                                   @NonNull MessageCallable<T> callable)
        This method add interceptor for incoming messages. If interceptor is defined for given message class - runnable will be executed instead of processMessage()
